i1.name: Illumination
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lux's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a mark to enemies hit that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits.

'''Lux's''' [[basic attack]]s and ''{{ai|Final Spark|Lux}}'' consume the mark to deal {{as|{{pp|20 to 190}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Lux's champion ability apply a mark to enemies hit that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits.

Lux's basic attacks and Lux's Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 âˆ’ 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.
i1.notes:
* Starting an {{tip|attack windup}} against a target with a mark that is about to expire refreshes its duration to {{fd|0.25}} seconds. Casting ''{{ai|Final Spark|Lux}}'' refreshes the marks of all marked enemies to {{fd|1.25}} seconds if they are within {{tt|5000|Estimated}} units of the ability's casting position and have a mark with a remaining duration of less than 1 second.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}} from consuming the mark.
** The on-hit damage from ''Illumination'' via basic attack cannot be blocked by ''spell shield''.
* ''Illumination's'' trigger from a basic attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (bonus damage is negated and the mark will still be consumed).
* {{Pending for test}}: Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Light_Binding
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' shoots a sphere of light in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first two enemies hit and {{tip|root|roots}} them for 2 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Lux shoots a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and roots them for 2 seconds.
q1.notes:
* Targets immune to the {{tip|root}} still count towards ''Light Binding's'' two-target limit.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

w1.name: Prismatic_Barrier
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' throws her wand in the target direction that homes back to her after reaching maximum range. Allied champions hit by the wand gain a {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, which can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.
'''Lux''' receives the shield upon throwing the wand and upon its return.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lux throws her wand in the target direction that homes back to her after reaching maximum range. Allied champions hit by the wand gain a shield for 2.5 seconds, which can stack up to 2 times, stacking with the previous shield and refreshing its duration.
Lux receives the shield upon throwing the wand and upon its return.
leveling: {{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|40*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Each pass of the wand grants a shield to each target once.
* ''Prismatic Barrier'' may only stack up to 2 times. Subsequent instances of passing through the wand have no effect on the shield's strength nor duration.
* The shield will also be granted to allies near the wand's return location.
* Both passes of ''Prismatic Barrier'' cannot hit units whose {{tip|center range|center}} is beyond the missile range or behind its origin, even if their {{tip|edge range|hitbox radius}} overlaps.
** At the return location, this behaviour is overridden by an additional center check with the same diameter as the missile width.
* If '''Lux''' {{tip|death|dies}} before her wand returns it will fizzle upon reaching maximum range.
* '''Lux's''' wand decelerates on the way out and accelerates on the way back.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''Prismatic Barrier'' is destroyed by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} but not {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

e1.name: Lucent_Singularity
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' sends a lucent singularity to the target location that lasts 5 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies.

''Lucent Singularity'' can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Lux''' detonates the singularity, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within. If ''Lucent Singularity'' was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.
The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by ''Lucent Singularity's'' detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lux sends a lucent singularity to the target location that lasts 5 seconds, granting sight of the area and slowing nearby enemies.

Lucent Singularity can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
Recast: Lux detonates the singularity, dealing magic damage to enemies within. If Lucent Singularity was recast while in flight, it will detonate upon arrival.
The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity's detonation are also slowed by the same amount for 1 second.
e1.notes:
* The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** The manual recast does not.
* ''Lucent Singularity'' grants {{tip|sight}} while also in flight.

r1.name: Final_Spark
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' fires a massive laser in a line in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, as well as granting {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Lux fires a massive laser in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and reveals them for 1.5 seconds, as well as granting sight of the surrounding area.
